summary:
*On Ellen*
Ellen: so I know you want to meet Dan and Phil
Me: yeah how do you know- 
*Voldemort with a rat in hand shows up*
Me:...
body:
*On Ellen*

Ellen: so I know you want to meet Dan and Phil

Me: yeah how do you know-

*Voldemort with a rat in hand shows up*

Me: omg ellen you didn’t
